__COMMENT: Load with steam environment variables to stop it from losing the output of the game when launched with steam

rcon.__COMMENT: Set password to null to automatically generate a password. RCON may be required in the future so ProjectIO needs to know about it.

client.__COMMENT: Enable or disable auto spawning a client and connecting to the ProjectIO server.

advanced.__COMMENT: Terminal width is the spawned fake terminal width, adjusting this will require you to change it in the lua responder
